welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sevenoaks, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport, serving all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights at Biggin Hill Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport caters to the needs of luxury and VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is a modern and spacious terminal serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport offers a wide range of shops, restaurants, and facilities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A mid-sized terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The second newest and second largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then charges apply.
